channel.title: Need Help with Server connecting!
channel.description:
What it is , when i put my server online it says connecting to 0.0.0.0:43594 I dont know if its meant to do that but it does..
And when i run my client and connect to the right ip address it says something like " Failed to get responce from server please try another world ".
Does anyone know how to fix this please? if so please could you help me by telling me below?
I will pay £5 paypal
